course_title: Introduction to Writing for Comedic Forms

001.comments: All CRWR Winter Term 1 (September-December) courses/sections will be held online. For this particular course, lectures will be delivered through videos and slides and can be accessed during class time along with a discussion or asynchronously if unable to attend. The discussion will also be available to students who are unable to attend class during the allocated time.

description: An examination of and practice in creative writing in comedic forms, including stand-up, sketch, film, new media, and text. Manuscript submission not required for admission.
